specialRules.hint: This unit gets +6” range when firing its Pulse Carbines.
specialRules.name: Accelerator Drone
specialRules.label: Accelerator Drone
specialRules.description: This unit gets +6” range when firing its Pulse Carbines.

specialRules.hint: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if they are within 12” of this model.
specialRules.name: Beacon
specialRules.label: Beacon
specialRules.description: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if they are within 12” of this model.

specialRules.hint: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of these powers, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Wind: +3” when moving • Fire: +1 to shooting rolls • Water: +3” to shooting range • Earth: +1 to melee rolls Good Shot: This model shoots at Quality 4+.
specialRules.name: Elemental Power
specialRules.label: Elemental Power
specialRules.description: When the hero and his unit are activated pick one of these powers, and they get one of these special rules until the end of the round: • Wind: +3” when moving • Fire: +1 to shooting rolls • Water: +3” to shooting range • Earth: +1 to melee rolls Good Shot: This model shoots at Quality 4+.

specialRules.hint: Enemies get -3” movement when trying to charge this unit.
specialRules.name: Inhibitor Drone
specialRules.label: Inhibitor Drone
specialRules.description: Enemies get -3” movement when trying to charge this unit.

specialRules.hint: The model and his unit count as having the Regeneration special rule.
specialRules.name: Shield Drone
specialRules.label: Shield Drone
specialRules.description: The model and his unit count as having the Regeneration special rule.

specialRules.hint: This model may try to mark an enemy unit instead of firing one of its weapons. Pick one enemy unit within 36” and line of sight and roll one die, on a 4+ it’s marked. Friendly units may remove markers from the target to get +X to their shooting rolls against the marked unit, where X is the number of removed markers.
specialRules.name: Spotting Laser
specialRules.label: Spotting Laser
specialRules.description: This model may try to mark an enemy unit instead of firing one of its weapons. Pick one enemy unit within 36” and line of sight and roll one die, on a 4+ it’s marked. Friendly units may remove markers from the target to get +X to their shooting rolls against the marked unit, where X is the number of removed markers.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1A to their Pulse Shotguns, Pulse Carbines or Pulse Rifles when using Hold actions.
specialRules.name: Volley Fire
specialRules.label: Volley Fire
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1A to their Pulse Shotguns, Pulse Carbines or Pulse Rifles when using Hold actions.

specialRules.hint: Whenever an enemy unit charges this model roll one die per charging model. For each 4+ it takes 1 hit with AP(1).
specialRules.name: Anti-Charge System
specialRules.label: Anti-Charge System
specialRules.description: Whenever an enemy unit charges this model roll one die per charging model. For each 4+ it takes 1 hit with AP(1).

specialRules.hint: Enemy units over 18” away get -1 to shooting rolls per drone.
specialRules.name: Stealth Drone
specialRules.label: Stealth Drone
specialRules.description: Enemy units over 18” away get -1 to shooting rolls per drone.

spells.name: Patience
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Stealth next time it is shot at.

spells.name: Killing Blow
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Boldness
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 3”.

spells.name: Devastating Strike
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits with AP(1).

spells.name: Pacification
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -3 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Deadly Surge
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 12” take 6 automatic hits each.
